### INSTALL ###
IF(WIN32)
	IF(NOT EXISTS ${3RDPARTY}/build-4.2.0/b2.exe)
		MESSAGE("Installing Boost-Build")
		##DKSETPATH(${DKDOWNLOAD})
		##DKDOWNLOAD(https://github.com/boostorg/build/archive/4.2.0.zip)
		## DKDOWNLOAD(${DKWEB}/Download/build-4.2.0.zip)
		##DKEXTRACT(${DIGITALKNOB}/Download/4.2.0.zip ${3RDPARTY})
		## DKSETPATH(${3RDPARTY}/build-4.2.0)
		## EXECUTE_PROCESS(COMMAND cmd /c bootstrap.bat vc14 WORKING_DIRECTORY ${CURRENT_DIR})
		DKINSTALL(https://github.com/boostorg/build/archive/4.2.0.zip ${DKDOWNLOAD}/build-4.2.0)
		DKRENAME(${DKDOWNLOAD}/4.2.0.zip build-4.2.0.zip)
	ENDIF()
	DKSET(BOOSTBUILD ${3RDPARTY}/build-4.2.0)
	DKSET(BJAM ${BOOSTBUILD}/src/engine/bjam.exe)
ENDIF()
